Round 1.name: Technical
questions: Describe a time you optimized performance.

Round 2.name: Behavioral

transcript.question: Explain the two-pointer algorithm.
transcript.answer: two pointer algo has 2 pointer one at the begining and one at the end

transcript.question: Describe a time you optimized performance.
transcript.answer: in my current company i worked on implementing amazon q across my team which helped optimise our work and saved us 40% more time

transcript.question: Tell me about a conflict at work.
transcript.answer: i had an issue when my tech lead did not acknowledge my work, i was upset and had had upfront conversation with him and resolved it

transcript.question: Describe a leadership situation.
transcript.answer: i lead the ai adoption in my vertical

transcript.question: Design a scalable notification service.
transcript.answer: i am not sure how to do that rn as it was out of my scope but i will be sure to look into it
